Token.Abstract: \nosubgrouping This class contains an collection of methods to convert different Objective C objects. This is a little versio of this class with a small subset of useful methods to use with 'TTCSS' Classes. See JUMP Framework to retrieve the full version.
Take an NSString Object and try to convert to NSNumber.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Converted object or if an conversion isn't possible will return nil.
